content.title: Game Beta Access
content.creator:
Abraham Cozar
March 22, 2025
content.content:
Surprise!
We've been thinking a lot about how positive it has been for both us and our last release (Mika and the Witch's Mountain) to go through a beta with our backers. While it obviously requires more time, it allows us to deliver a better game thanks to your help!
Let's do it again with Elusive! We're getting incredible support, so we've added the Game Beta Access as an addon and it will also be automatically included in these 4 contributions:
ELUSIVE COLLECTOR'S EDITION
YOUR MESSAGE IN GAME
HANDSIGNED LIMITED EDITION
HANDSIGNED COLLECTOR'S EDITION
*If you have supported any of these 4, you don't need to select this as addon.
Game Beta Access important considerations (Read carefully, please!)
This version will have a representative part of the content, with several hours of gameplay, but it will not be the full content until the release of the game.
This will add the game to the Steam library and when the game is released it will be an identical version of the final game with all the functionalities: trophies, cloud save, etc. 
Participants in the Beta program will have the full content a few days before the release.
The beta will be private and closed, so it will not be allowed to share content (no videos, no screenshots, no streaming). The content shown in the beta will not be the final one, and we don‚Äôt want to tarnish the experience of future players.
The beta keys will be only for Steam and very limited. 1000 Steam key units for addons to be added for any pledge and 1500 Steam key units will be included automatically on the Pledges mentioned above.
And when will you have access? In 2026, so the wait until the full release will be more bearable :)
We encourage you to select this reward only for those who want to actively participate in this process of testing and improving the game by providing feedback (Discord and forms), given its limited nature.
ADD THE GAME BETA ACCESS TO YOUR PLEDGE NOW
Hope you liked the surprise, let's keep pushing together these last weeks!

comments.text: You said four tiers will get this key. One of them called your message in game tier but I do not see that in the tiers. I backed to get the physical game and figure at 129. Do I get a beta key?

Hello Caleb, the beta key is included on top tier rewards over 149, and they are also available as addon for other rewards. In your case I think is better jump to Collector's edition reward instead of the addon.
You would think you would want a much larger pool of people beta testing a game. Why limit it to a paid access?
Hi James! The max number of Beta Steam Keys are limited by Steam, and this is a key that grant access to the final game on release.
¬°Poned m√°s recompensas!, ya ha pasado la mitad del tiempo de la campa√±a y esto puede dar a√∫n m√°s de s√≠ (si quer√©is, claro).

content.title: 5th Stretch Goal achieved: the Scent Cloak + artbook
content.creator:
Abraham Cozar
March 17, 2025
content.content:
Good news to start a new week: the Scent Cloak will be added to Elusive!
Now the real challenge has come:
Special Combat Attacks
Some animals act strangely, and they will make things really difficult for Zoe and the rest of Elusive from the Red-Watering Can. You must be brave and stop them!
Also, it looks like he may be able to give us some clues as to the whereabouts of Zoe's father. How might he be related?
ELUSIVE ARTBOOK
At Chibig, we always put a lot of effort into developing the characters and the world of our video games through extensive concept art. Thanks to our illustrators, we have a wealth of graphic material that we love to compile.
That‚Äôs why we always create an artbook featuring all the concept art and illustrations we‚Äôve made for the final game.
Elusive is the project where we‚Äôve dedicated the most work to the artistic side, which is why we‚Äôre convinced it will result in a stunning artbook of at least 80 pages. If we receive more support for this reward, we‚Äôll be able to expand it with even more pages.
This reward will be available in both digital and physical formats. We encourage you to get the physical edition, as it will be one of the elements that make our Collector‚Äôs Edition unique and memorable.
UPGRADE NOW TO THE COLLECTOR'S EDITION
We must keep pushing, friends, but we trust you!
Let us know what you think on Discord or in the comments!

comments.text: Wow, lots of things happening. Love the progress. ‚ù£Ô∏è
Is there any chance the physical artbook will be available as an add-on?
Not for now, sorry!
I‚Äôm so excited! I hope we can push this past 500k!
Omg that would be amazing!

content.title: 4th Stretch Goal achieved: Fishing Minigame + Physical update
content.creator:
Abraham Cozar
March 14, 2025
content.content:
Get your gear ready, Elusive friends, because we're going fishing ‚ú®
The Elusive have no interest in trying to catch a fish - have you seen its size? Too risky!
Resource fishing makes much more sense, so we'll have to help Zoe to get a powerful magnet that can help us clean the bottom of the waters in search of real treasures.
Now we're in the middle of an important step, and we need your support and feedback: It's time to talk about combat in Elusive
We've been thinking about it a lot in the last few days and we think it can add a layer of fun and relevance to the story with the approach we have in mind.
For now, let's go for the next Stretch Goal: the Scent Cloak!
We can't give too many details at this time as it is in process, but we would very much like it to have some effect on the (harmless) animals or Zoe's health.
We‚Äôre not so far, let‚Äôs do it! 
YOU REALLY LIKE PHYSICAL THINGS!
Thank you so much for the incredible support you‚Äôve shown for our collector‚Äôs editions! 
In just one day, 100 units have already been reserved.
We‚Äôd like to highlight a very special item included in this edition:
‚ú® The Zoe Figurine ‚ú®
An exclusive 4''/10 cm full-color figurine, carefully crafted by our friends at Undigital.
3D printed real prototype
The quality of Undigital‚Äôs figurines is truly outstanding, as you can see in previous pieces like the Mika and the Witch's Mountain figurine with this amiibo like style!
We‚Äôre getting close to reaching 500 units of Zoe's figurine, and once we hit that number, we‚Äôll reveal a secret stretch goal with upgrades that we know you‚Äôre going to love!
Don‚Äôt miss out! this edition is exclusive to Kickstarter! 
UPGRADE NOW TO THE COLLECTOR'S EDITION
Here's our Discord community, a chill and safe place to share your thoughts, requests and asking any question!

comments.text: Combat: Seeing that the title is Elusive; I think combat should be focused on dodging and jumping mechanics. Since Elusives are hidden from us maybe the boss fights could be "stages" and use parts of the environment (or the body of the boss, think sneaking around to "itch" their head and they smack themselves or guiding them to "ropes" that causes the boss to fall/ trap themelves) to take them down vs a full frontal attack with blocking and parry mechanics. Regular combat could be a method of stunning the "enemies" with a staff or could leave "food" to distract them and find a peaeful way around them. If use this method, then next tiem in the area the "enemies" become friendly to you with little emoticons to the main character. I feel like Elusives would not want to terrorize their ecosystem...literally off the top of my head (but if you need help designing let me know lol) (also posted this in the Comments section)

content.title: New Pledge Available: Elusive Collector‚Äôs Edition
content.creator:
Abraham Cozar
March 12, 2025
content.content:
Some of you have already noticed (and supported it!), but we wanted to officially announce that we've added ‚ú® the Collector's Edition ‚ú® pledge to the Elusive campaign.
After the incredible support to get the physical edition upgrade, our publisher proposed to create a Collector's Edition for Kickstarter with some additional items. Also, some of you had already shared with us your requests and suggestions about elements such as the soundtrack and artbook, so we took the opportunity!
UPGRADE NOW TO THE COLLECTOR'S EDITION
This is our sixth Kickstarter campaign (we survived the Mika and the Witch's Mountain campaign with 24,000 backers!) and we also have experience with the Collector's Edition of our already released games, so we are confident we can create a great new edition.
The Elusive Collector‚Äôs Edition includes:
Elusive - Physical Game (Nintendo Switch/2/PS5)
Elusive - Digital Game in your platform
Zoe color figure 4‚Äù/ 10cm PVC/Vynil
Physical Artbook - New!
Physical Soundtrack - New!
4x Postcards - New!
Digital Artbook
Digital Soundtrack
Kickstarter Exclusive Outfit
Discord server exclusive for backers
Digital goodies pack
Your name in the credits - gold section
We can't confirm how this edition will look yet, but we can expect something pretty similar to this:
We‚Äôre getting closer to the next Stretch Goal - The Fishing Minigame! So hopefully we‚Äôll be here with a new update soon. 

Watch your steps!

comments.text: Wish I could swing the CE. I all the goodies for Witch but funds low. Physical edition will have to do.
Any chance to get a physical art book as an add-on? üôèüèªüòÅ
Not for now, sorry :x
I did wonder where the Collector‚Äôs Edition was! I‚Äôve upgraded my pledge; I cannot miss out!
Muchas gracias, acabo de cambiar la Handsighted Edition que hab√≠a elegido por la Handsighted Collector's Edition <3
Bummed to see that the "Your message in-game" isn't included with the handsigned collector's editions like it is for the handsigned limited edition.
Oh, this is a mistake and we can't fix It now in the reward information, but it will be also included. We'll put the info in the campaign and FAQ. Thanks for your comment!
Amazing! Thanks for clarifying!
Thanks for the Update! Just changed my pledge :)
Do you have a fix editor to publish this collector edition ?
Not yet! At least for the worldwide production, we're in conversations still
So the physical and the digital games are on the same platform then? Or can I chose the physical Switch version and the digital PC version?
Hi! You can choose different platforms for your physical and digital game (I.e. Nintendo Switch for the physical copy and Xbox Series for the digital).
Cool, that is a deal then. Had a early physical pledge with digital and figureine addon, now I get even more for a bit less <3

content.title: Second Stretch Goal achieved: Physical Edition Upgrade
content.creator:
Abraham Cozar
March 10, 2025
content.content:
Good start of the week, everyone!
And there's no better way to do it than with an achievement: the Physical Edition Upgrade!
Now all the physical editions (including Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2 and PlayStation 5) will include a printed booklet, like good old times hehe
Note: the booklet won‚Äôt be included as reward in digital format in any pledge, for now.
Now it‚Äôs time to unveil the next Stretch Goal and take a look to what will be next‚Ä¶if you support the campaign enough!
Fishing Minigame - Fish like an Elusive!
And you may be wondering: how can a tiny being catch something that is probably bigger than you? Well, while we have yet to design this minigame, we can share our intentions.
One of the many things we are proud of about Mika and the Witch's Mountain is that we have proposed a fishing minigame that is very eye-catching and fun for players, and that is also more respectful of animals (yes, we know they are not real animals!).
We would like to follow this path in Elusive, so instead of trying to catch fish or other aquatic creatures, we are considering a type of junk fishing that allows you to get special resources.
Maybe magnet fishing? Hook diving? We will share more information when the time comes.
Let‚Äôs hit the next one!

comments.text: Totally dig the idea of 'Resource Fishing'... that really does feel like an underexplored concept. Could have Tiers of Progression to it as well from the humble Hook attempting to literally hook basic lewt like Buttons floating on the surface to Magnet Fishing to try to nab useful metallic stuff that woulda been heavy and naturally float to the bottom of the Water to maybe something really high tier, like a Baby Sub with Wireless Camera, or a Elusive Tech equivalent... :D (Bet Baby Sub Fishing would be one way for Zoe to go to really flex her Resource Prowess and well earned Status late game!)
Some ideas are a little out of our league, but overall, are awesome ideas, thank you so much!
Love the magnet fishing angle.
I love the idea of magnet fishing for resources/ supplies.

Although if it's a magnet then it should only work on metal. I know we could just ignore that for game logic but I like when game mechanics take asuch physics into account as they can. So something more like Rex in Xenoblade Chronicles 2 where you dive off with a Bungie cord and come back with stuff appeals to me more.
Hmm... possible idea: Maybe the Hook upgrades into a Magnetized Hook...? :D
Hi! There are no Xbox physical edition, we're going to make the Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2 and PlayStation 5 physical editions. Thank you!
I see. Slightly disappointed we aren't fishing Goku style :p But junk fishing works. Reminds me of Divers in Xenoblade Chronicles 2.

content.title: Second Stretch Goal achieved: Mice Side Quest
content.creator:
Abraham Cozar
March 8, 2025
content.content:
You have put your foot on the accelerator and you are not going to stop, uh? Well, let's go for it! üèéÔ∏èüí®
The support Elusive is receiving is literally unbelievable and that only makes us want to give our all with this new adventure. So the Mice Quest will be included now in the development roadmap!
Now we are going to put the focus on something that had a spectacular reception in the campaign of Mika and the Witch's Mountain and that is the booklet of the physical edition.
New Stretch Goal Unlocked: Physical Edition Upgrade!
As gamers, we have suffered the sadness of opening the box of a newly purchased game and finding the cartridge or disc inside an empty box. Oh, the good old days when there was an instruction and curiosities manual included!
Support it and we will succeed in creating a physical edition for Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2 and PlayStation 5 that truly stands out in your physical collection and that we will be proud of.
Our Discord community is having a great time now with the campaign, so join us to chat about Elusive and other funny things!
Have a good raid!

comments.text: More cute friends in our life? Yes please! :)
Always! hehe
HECK YES!! Love me some mice.
will there be a digital add on of the booklet? Since there‚Äôs only a physical copy available as early bird
Hi Jessica! The booklet will be added in all the physical copies, no worries, but not for now in digital format, sorry.

Wouldn't fishing be rather dangerous for tiny people? ;p I'm generally not a big fan of fishing minigames. But I'm rather curious how it would be done in this context. So fingers crossed momentum doesn't stop before that.
What if we "fish" for things like dust mites, tardigrades or different types of plankton?
We're still working on the design and the challenge itself! We don't want to harm animals (like we did in Mika and the Witch's Mountain with the fishbowls) so, we'll see :D

content.title: 1st Stretch Goal achieved: New Zoe‚Äôs Cloak
content.creator:
Abraham Cozar
March 6, 2025
content.content:
Hello again!
This is getting fast, thank you for smashing the first Stretch Goal ‚ô•Ô∏è
Now Zoe will have a New Cloak! And not just for looking good, but with some pretty cool effects hehe
It's called The Lizard Cloak, so you can imagine where it's going, but what do you think it will look like? Green? With scales? WITH A TAIL?
Well, we should be unveiling the next Stretch Goal so‚Ä¶brrrrrrrr‚Ä¶Here it is:
New Animal Side Quest ‚Äî Help the Mice!‚ú®
Perhaps you noticed a little mouse walking around at the Red Watering Can (and even on the cover of the game üò≥) and we were wondering if this little friend could play a more interesting role in the Elusive beyond ‚Äúa cute addition‚Äù.
Wanna know what we thought about involving them in the game? Let‚Äôs push the campaign to the next goal!
You can also join our Discord server to chat about Elusive and other Chibig games.
Watch your steps!

comments.text: Totally wouldn't say no to mousey friends. :)
I tried to join the discord but it says invited are paused.
Hi. After some scam attempts, we needed to pause the invitations on the weekend, but it should be working again now. Thank you!
Brilliant! I‚Äôm hoping We smash through to the physical edition upgrade!
Hopefully the lizard cloak looks like it was made from the actual skin of a lizard that once lived around the house lol

content.title: WOOHOO! WE DID IT!
content.creator:
Abraham Cozar
March 6, 2025
content.content:
We can now say it out loud: ELUSIVE IS GOING TO HAPPEN.
Your support will never cease to amaze us. Every new game and every new campaign, you are there supporting us and sharing the excitement for indie games. As simple as this: THANK YOU SO MUCH ‚ù§Ô∏è
But this is just the beginning, what's next?
New goal: New Zoe's Cloak - 80K
Character customization is something we know you like (and, not gonna lie, we also do), but what if this cloak had additional functions or effects?
Help us reach our goal!
Remember that these two pledges are discounted for a limited time and that you can share the campaign with your friends to join Zoe's first raid: a Kickstarter campaign‚ú®
You can also join our Discord server to talk to the community about Elusive and other Chibig games.
See you in the next update!
